title: Please help me
body:
Ive been playing the game for a couple months and my and my friends are having alot of fun but since yesterday everytime I play sometimes during the game, my screen turns all grey then the game freezes and it has even crashed my whole computer. Everytime this happens i get the message "League of Legends was blocked by graphics card". I've tried many things including.
 1. uninstalling then reinstalling my graphics card
 2. uninstalling then reinstalling LoL
 3. Looking for corrupted files (didnt find any)
 4.many other small things
I use a GTX 970, please someone help i just wanna play cait more :/
